channel.title: My .JAR client won't load the background picture!
channel.description:
PLEASE HELP!! My .JAR client won't load the background picture!!
PLEASE HELP!!!

Wierd But anyway after I change that and place it in the folder with the other files, then I make a .JAR and put the picture in the folder with the .bat and .JAR?

item.source: My .JAR client won't load the background picture!

item.title: My .JAR client won't load the background picture!
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:
@gman035t wrote:

Sorry eclipse, I don’t have msn. I have aim.
Its not that hard. Inside your client.java file. Search something like this Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(System.getProperty(“user.dir”)

or try searching the name of your title backgound file. Example titlescreen.jpg
You need to have this file in the correct path. What I did, was changed ("\BIN\DATA\hellzend.jpg")); - to - ("\hellzend.jpg")); and placed hellzend.jpg with all the other files like the client.java file and all the class files etc.

Read full topic

It just says welcome to FoxScape - the client

and it doesn’t load. It just freezes there. on my client cmd.exe window though. It says whomever has logged in. But nothing progresses from there.
